search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for AWeber (aweber.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for AWeber's pricing page is: [https://www.aweber.com/pricing.htm](https://www.aweber.com/pricing.htm)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Affordable Pricing for Email Marketing and More - AWeber

extracted_content.content:
Affordable Pricing for Email Marketing and More | AWeber
===============

[Blog](https://blog.aweber.com/)

[✦ Newsletter Assistant](https://www.aweber.com/newsletter-assistant.htm)

Plans to support you every step of the way
==========================================

Get started for free and grow as your business grows.

Get up to 4 Months Free

Monthly

Annually

I have 0-500 subscribers. 

Unlimited

### Powerful email at one fixed price.

Have over 100,000 subscribers? Our fixed-price plan includes everything in our Plus plan. Perfect for scaling your business to new heights.

$899/month
----------

Billed monthly.

[Get Started with Unlimited](https://www.aweber.com/large-account-pricing.htm)

* * *

[View Plan Benefits ![Image 6: Yes](https://assets.aweber-static.com/www/assets/img/icons/icon__drop-down-arrow__blue.b4480c96.svg)](https://www.aweber.com/pricing.htm#) 

Send 15x subscriber volume, monthly

Unlimited subscribers

Unlimited email lists

Unlimited landing pages

Unlimited email automations

Personalized account management

Advanced reporting and analytics

Advanced landing page features

Sales tracking and low transaction fees

Remove AWeber branding

Plus

### Creators - take your business to the next level.

Unlimited automations and landing pages, advanced subscriber and message insights, and priority 24/7 support from our team of experts are the perfect tools to help you grow. Start today and see the results for yourself.

$19.99/month
------------

Billed annually.

[Get Started with Plus](https://www.aweber.com/paid.htm?pln=plus)

* * *

[View Plan Benefits ![Image 7: Yes](https://assets.aweber-static.com/www/assets/img/icons/icon__drop-down-arrow__blue.b4480c96.svg)](https://www.aweber.com/pricing.htm#) 

[Send 12x subscriber max, monthly](https://www.aweber.com/pricing.htm#)

Unlimited email lists

Unlimited landing pages

Unlimited email automations

Unlimited custom segments

Unlimited users

Priority, 24/7 support

Advanced reporting and analytics

Advanced landing page features

Sales tracking and low transaction fees

Remove AWeber branding

Lite

### Time to upgrade your email game.

The tools every creator needs to build their audience, run an online course, and sell products online. Create landing pages, automate your sales funnel, and sell directly through email. Let's level up your side hustle.

$12.49/month
------------

Billed annually.

[Get Started with Lite](https://www.aweber.com/paid.htm?pln=lite)

* * *

[View Plan Benefits ![Image 8: Yes](https://assets.aweber-static.com/www/assets/img/icons/icon__drop-down-arrow__blue.b4480c96.svg)](https://www.aweber.com/pricing.htm#) 

[Send 10x subscriber max, monthly](https://www.aweber.com/pricing.htm#)

1 Email list

3 Landing pages

3 Email automations

3 Users

1 Custom segment

24/7 Support

Advanced message analytics

~Advanced landing page features~

~Sales tracking and low transaction fees~

~Remove AWeber branding~

Free

### Get started for free!

Our user-friendly tools and tutorials make building an audience fast and easy. Whether you're creating a simple email newsletter or building an entire digital business, AWeber is the perfect place to leverage the power of email.

$0.00/month
-----------

Upgrade at any time.

[Get started with Free](https://www.aweber.com/free.htm)
